headline: Campbell’s Appoints Daniel L. Poland Chief Enterprise Transformation Officer
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., November 14, 2024--Campbell Soup Company (NASDAQ:CPB) (Campbell’s) today announced the appointment of Daniel L. Poland to the newly created role of Executive Vice President and Chief Enterprise Transformation Officer, effective immediately. Poland will continue to report to President and Chief Executive Officer Mark Clouse and remain a member of Campbell’s Operating Committee.

content.title: Campbell’s Appoints Daniel L. Poland Chief Enterprise Transformation Officer

Poland will continue to report to President and Chief Executive Officer Mark Clouse and remain a member of Campbell’s Operating Committee.

thumbnail.caption: Daniel L. Poland, Executive Vice President and Chief Enterprise Transformation Officer (Photo: Business Wire)

headline: Campbell Soup Rao's Brand Growth Strong And US Sales Trend Improving, Analyst Upgrades Stock
summary: Piper Sandler analyst Michael S. Lavery upgraded Campbell Soup Company (NASDAQ:CPB) to Overweight from Neutral, raising the price forecast from $47 to $56. The analyst upgraded Campbell Soup due to improved long-term growth prospects from its Rao’s brand and better sales trends in the U.S. (excluding SOVO brands). Despite better trends, the stock has had a 15% pullback since mid-September. The analyst sees this as a good buying opportunity. Lower steel costs (down 25%) and secured contracts for
